author: Times Of India
title: 'India ready to help friends': PM on HCQ export
description: Calling for joint efforts to fight against coronavirus, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said India is ready to help its 'friends' in combating the deadly virus. "We have to jointly fight this pandemic. India is ready to do whatever is possible to help …
content:
Thank you President @jairbolsonaro. The India-Brazil partnership is stronger than ever in these challenging times. https://t.co/z19ufJeswo
— Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) 1586494012000
